channel.title: Java on My little software warehouse
channel.description: Recent content in Java on My little software warehouse

item.title: Tcp connections in Android
item.description: Or how to keep your app connected and stop worrying.  Disclaimer: This is not another place where you can find java code snippet to open a socket and read and write to some server. If you need that, go back to your favorite search engine and look for another result. But be careful: while looking for "inspiration" I found a lot of examples where the connection was held inside the UI thread.
